name: IT Professor Simulator
description: This game is about sharing the knowledge of programming and computer science and all the painful baggage that comes with that task. As a professor your job is to not only teach the questions according to the curriculum to the students, but to also make sure that they don’t go to sleep and comprehend it. Take too long and you’ll find most of your students are dozed off. CLICK on your students to give them a stern push back to reality. Compete against other acclaimed professors in your university and see if you can be the greatest of your institution!
